alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 6:33PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, eastern Limestone and southern Lincoln Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 633 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huntsville International Airport, or near Madison, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Madison, Athens, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Triana, Marshall Space Flight Center and Harvest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Alabama.
